name: Hello World
description: Write a program that outputs "Hello World!".

name: If Statements
description:
Write a program that asks the user:

How old are you?

If the user is 18 or older, the program should say:

You can drive a car.

If the user is under 18 years old, the program should say:

You will have to walk.

checker.output: How old are you?You can drive a car.;How old are you?You will have to walk.;How old are you?You can drive a car.
